queries.title: DAX: Calculate Total Sales
queries.dax:
EVALUATE
SUMMARIZE (
    Sales,
    ADDCOLUMNS (
        Sales[Product],
        "Total Sales", SUM ( Sales[Amount] )
    )
)
queries.pandas:
import pandas as pd
sales = pd.read_csv('sales.csv')
total_sales = sales.groupby('Product')['Amount'].sum().reset_index()
print(total_sales)

queries.title: DAX: Filter Sales with Quantity > 100
queries.pandas:
import pandas as pd
sales = pd.read_csv('sales.csv')
filtered_sales = sales[sales['Quantity'] > 100]
print(filtered_sales)

queries.title: SQL: Calculate Average Price
queries.dax:
EVALUATE
ADDCOLUMNS (
    Sales,
    "Average Price", AVERAGE ( Sales[Price] )
)
queries.sql:
SELECT AVG(Price) AS 'Average Price'
FROM Sales;
queries.pandas:
import pandas as pd
sales = pd.read_csv('sales.csv')
average_price = sales['Price'].mean()
print('Average Price:', average_price)

queries.title: SQL: List Distinct Products
queries.pandas:

sales = pd.read_csv('sales.csv')

print(distinct_products)

queries.title: Pandas: Total Sales by Region
queries.dax:
EVALUATE
SUMMARIZE (
    Sales,
    Sales[Region],
    "Total Sales", SUM ( Sales[Amount] )
)
queries.pandas:
import pandas as pd
sales = pd.read_csv('sales.csv')
total_sales_by_region = sales.groupby('Region')['Amount'].sum().reset_index()
print(total_sales_by_region)
